text:
@NYGovCuomo Gov Andy,
The other day, you talked about; "RESPECT"...
Here's RESPECT...by the numbers!!!

NYS = 5.88% of US Pop
NYS = 23.80% of US CoVid19 DEATHS

NYS = 0.27% of World Pop
NYS = 6.80% of World CoVid19 DEATHS

Please ESPLAIN this whilst yapping 2-day
;~)

https://t.co/9kGdYAx1CZ
